A.CPG.001.title: Validate pagination - LinksPaginated
given: the page parameter is included in a GET request
when: the page value is a number and page-size is [1,25,1000,null]

and: the nominated <page number> is returned
the response has a status of 200
the "first" link has page=1
the "last" link is greater than or equal to 1
the "self" link has page=<page number>
the "prev" link has page equal to 1 or <page number> - 1
the "prev" link has page equal to "last" or <page number> + 1
"meta"/"totalPages" is greater than or equal to <page number>
"meta"/"totalRecords" is greater than or equal to <page number> * <page size>

A.CPG.002.title: Validate pagination - Invalid page size value
given: the <page-size> parameter is specified in a GET request
when: the value for <page-size> is outside the range [1..1000]
OR the <page-size> is a not a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/InvalidPageSize"

A.CPG.003.title: Validate pagination - Non-numeric <page>
given: the <page> parameter is included in a GET request
when: the <page> is a not a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CPG.004.title: Validate pagination - Max record limit exceeded
given: the <page> parameter is included in a GET request
when: the <page> value is greater than the number of pages available

and: the response has a status of 422
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
the error code is "Field/InvalidPage"

A.CPG.005.title: Validate pagination - Non-numeric <page-size>
given: the <page-size> parameter is included in a GET request
when: the page size parameter value is not a positive integer (number)

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CVN.001.title: Validate version - valid version number [x-v]
given: the <x-v> header is included in a get request
when: the value for the <x-v> is a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 200
<x-v> is in the repsonse header
<x-v> is a positive integer

A.CVN.002.title: Validate version - invalid version value [x-v]
given: the version parameter is included in a GET request
when: the version value is not a valid number is [-1,0,1001]

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CVN.003.title: Validate version - validate [x-v] format
given: the version parameter is included in a GET request
when: the verison value is not a valid number is an alpha (e.g. "foo")

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CVN.004.title: Validate version - supported version without <x-v-min>
given: the <x-v>  is included in a  request header
AND <x-v-min> is NOT included
when: the request version <x-v> is not supported

and: the response has a status of 406
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/UnsupportedVersion"

A.CVN.005.title: Validate version - supported version with <x-v-min>
given: the <x-v>  is included in a  request header
AND <x-v-min> is included
when: no version between <x-v> and <x-min-v> is supported

and: the response has a status of 406
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/UnsupportedVersion"

A.CVM.001.title: Validate version - <x-v-min> is provided
given: the <x-v-min> header is included in a get request
when: the value for the <x-v-min>  is a positive integer

and: <x-v> is in the repsonse header
<x-v> is a positive integer

A.CVM.002.title: Validate minimum version - validate <x-v-min> format
given: the <x-v-min> header is included in a get request
when: the <x-min-v> is a not a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CFI.001.title: Validate FAPI Interation ID - included in request
given: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is included in the header of the request
when: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is in a valid format

and: the response has a status of 200
the Data Holder has returned the <x-fapi-interaction-id> from the request in the response header

A.CFI.003.title: Validate FAPI Interation ID - invalid format
given: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is included in the GET request
when: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is not in a valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/invalid"

A.CFA.001.title: Validate FAPI Auth date - valid format
given: the called API is a resource call and does require authentication
when: the <x-fapi-auth-date> is present in the request header
AND is in a valid format
A.CFA.001.then: the response has a status of 200

A.CFA.002.title: Validate FAPI Auth date - missing from header
given: the called API is a resource call and does require authentication
when: the <x-fapi-auth-date> is NOT present  in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
error code is "Header/missing"

A.CFA.003.title: Validate FAPI Auth date - invalid format
given: the called API is a resource call and does require authentication
when: the <x-fapi-auth-date> is  in the request header
AND is NOT in a valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/invalid"

A.CFA.010.title: No<x-fapi-auth-date> in header (Energy specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: a response is returned
A.CFA.010.then: the <x-fapi-auth-date> is NOT present in the response header

A.CFA.011.title: No <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> in header (Energy specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: a response is returned
A.CFA.011.then: the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is NOT present in the response header

A.CFA.012.title: No <x-cds-client-header> in header (Energy specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: a response is returned
A.CFA.012.then: the <x-cds-client-header> is NOT present in the response header

A.CFC.001.title: Validate FAPI Customer IP Address - is present
given: the called API requires authentication
when: the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is present in the request header
AND is in a valid IPv4 or IPv6 format
A.CFC.001.then: the response has a status of 200

A.CFC.003.title: Validate FAPI Customer IP Address - missing from header
given: the called API requires authentication
when: the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is NOT present in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Missing"

A.CFC.002.title: Validate FAPI Customer IP Address - invalid format
given: the called API requires authentication
when: the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> in present the request header
AND is NEITHER  in a valid IPv4 or IPv6 format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/invalid"

A.CCH.001.title: Validate the client headers - valid format
given: the called API requires authentication
AND the call is an attended, ie customer present, call
when: the <x-cds-client-headers> is present in the request header
AND is Base64 encoded
A.CCH.001.then: the response has a status of 200

A.CCH.002.title: Validate the client headers - missing from header
given: the called API requires authentication
AND the call is an attended, ie customer present, call
when: the <x-cds-client-headers> is NOT present in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/missing"

A.CCH.003.title: Validate the client headers - invalid format
given: the called API requires authentication
AND the call is an attended, ie customer present, call
when: the <x-cds-client-headers>  present the request header
AND is Not Base64 encoded

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Invalid"

A.CAI.001.title: (Energy specific)CDS arrangement id - present and valid
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: the <x-cds-arrangement> is present in the request header
AND is in a valid format
A.CAI.001.then: the response has a status of 200

A.CAI.002.title: CDS arrangement id - missing from header  (Energy specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: the <x-cds-arrangement> is NOT present in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Missing"

A.CAI.003.title: CDS arrangement id - present but invalid (Energy specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: the <x-cds-arrangement> is present in the request header
AND is NOT in a valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Invalid"

A.COD.001.title: Validate the Oldest Date parameter - valid format
given: the <oldest-date> is included as a query parameter
when: the <oldest-date> is in a valid DateString format

and: the response has a status of 200
the data is constrained by the date supplied

A.COD.002.title: Validation the Oldest Date parameter - invalid format
given: the <oldest-date> is included as a query parameter
when: the <oldest-date> is not in a DateString valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/invalid"

A.CND.001.title: Validate the Newest Date parameter - valid format
given: the <newest-date> is included as a query parameter
when: the <newest-date> is in a valid DateString format

and: the response has a status of 200
the data is constrained by the date supplied

A.CND.002.title: Validation the Newest Date parameter - invalid format
given: the <newest-date> is included as a query parameter
when: the <newest-date> is not in a valid DateString format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.BAN.001.title: Call Accounts - no query aprameters
when: no query parameters are specified

A.BAN.002.title: Call Accounts - with category
when: <product-category> is set in query string

and: <product-category> is valid
result set is not empty

A.BAN.003.title: Call Accounts - with status
when: <open-status> is set in query string

and: <open-status> is valid
result set is not empty

A.EAR.001.title: Schema compliance - EnergyServicePointListReponse
when: a 2xx status code is returned
A.EAR.001.then: the  response body complies with the EnergyServiceListReponse schema

A.EAR.002.title: Schema compliance - EnergyServiceDetailReponse
when: a 2xx status code is returned
A.EAR.002.then: the  response body complies with the EnergyServiceDetailReponse schema

A.EAS.001.title: Validate service point and schema - EnergyServicePointDetailResponse
given: the {servicePointId} is included in the DH to SDH request
when: the {servicePointId} value is valid

and: the response has a status of 200
the response body complies with the EnergyServicePointDetailResponse schema

A.EAS.002.title: Validate service point - invalid NMI value
given: the {servicePointId} is included in the DH to SDH request url
when: The requested service point is permanently unavailable. No subsequent request for the service point will be successful.

and: the response has a status of 404
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Authorisation/InvalidServicePoint"

A.EAS.003.title: Validate service point - unavailable NMI
given: the {servicePointId} is included in the DH to SDH request
when: The requested service point is temporarily unavailable. Subsequent requests for the service point may be successful.

and: the response has a status of 404
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Authorisation/UnavailableServicePoint"

A.EAS.004.title: Validate schema - EnergyServicePointListReponse
given: the request to call the API is formatted correctly by the DH
when: the SDH receives the request

and: the response has a status code 200
the response body complies with the EnergyServiceListResponse schema

A.EAS.005.title: Validate service point and schema - EnergyUsageListResponse
given: the {servicePointId} is included in the DH to SDH request
when: the {servicePointId} value is valid
AND the request is formated correctlly

and: the response has a status code of 200
the response body complies with the EnergyUsageListResponse schema

A.EAS.006.title: Validate servicePointIdList body and schema - EnergyUsageListResponse
given: the request payload to call the API is formatted correctly
AND contains the mandatory fields
when: the SDH receives the request and interprets the Body

and: the response has a status code 200
the response body complies with the EnergyUsageListResponse schema

A.EAS.007.title: Validate service point and schema - EnergyDerDetailResponse
given: the {servicePointId} is included in the DH to SDH request
when: the {servicePointId} value is valid

and: the response has a status of 200
the response body complies with the EnergyDerDetailResponse schema

A.EAS.008.title: Validate servicePointIdList body and schema - EnergyDerListResponse
given: the request payload to call the API is formatted correctly
AND contains the mandatory fields
when: the SDH receives the request and interprets the Body

and: the response has a status code 200
the response body complies with the EnergyDerListResponse schema

A.EAS.009.title: Validate servicePointIdList - invalid body values
given: the request payload does not contain the required fields
OR the request payload is NOT well formatted
when: the SDH receives the request and interprets the Body

and: the response has a status code 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse
error code is "Field/Invalid"

T.EAR.002.title: Get Service points - with pagination
T.EAR.002.description: Obtain a paginated list of service points owned by the customer that has authorised the current session
preConditions: <page-size> and<page> query parameters are provided

T.EAR.003.title: Get Service points - invalid version

preConditions: <page-size> and<page> query parameters are provided

preConditions: The value <x-v> is set in the request header to a version not supported by the DH

AND <page-size>) query parameters are provided

AND the value for <x-v> is in a valid  format

T.EAS.007.description: Ensure the endpoint returns servicePointId compatible errors
preConditions: The <{servicePointId}> is set in the Path to a value that is

preConditions: The {servicePointId} is set in the Path to a value that is unavailable

T.EAS.009.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Point Detail - no pagination

preConditions: Neither <page-size> or <page> query parameters are provided

T.EAS.010.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - with pagination

preConditions: <page-size> and<page> query parameters are provided

T.EAS.011.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - unsupported version

preConditions: The value <x-v> is set in the request header to a version not supported by the DH

T.EAS.012.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - invalid page parameters
T.EAS.012.description: Ensure that the endpoint returns pagination errors
preConditions: <page> OR (<page>
AND <page-size>) query parameters are provided

T.EAS.013.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - oldest date

preConditions: <oldest-date> query parameters is provided

T.EAS.014.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - newest date
T.EAS.014.description: Obtain a list of service points owned by the consumer that has authorised the current session
preConditions: <newest-date> query parameter is provided
AND <newest-date> is a valid DateTime string

T.EAS.015.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - invalid Service Point ID

T.EAS.017.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - invalid format oldest date

preConditions: Neither <page-size> or <page> query parameters are provided

T.EAS.018.title: DH call to SDH: Get Usage for Service Points - invalid format newest date

SUITE.004.title: APIs - Banking Scheduled Payments and Payees
